channel.title: Connection duration
channel.description: How can i set the duration when the server logs the client out. Like when people ain't playing but he is still logged in. Logs out like in 30 seconds to lower server resources.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 29, 2007, 07:10:33 AM[/size][hr]bump
